Summary: Bright star-like object as bright as Venus on a clear night
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile in my back yard this morning, observed an object similar to the one described in case 50765 at Yuma, AZ. This was a star-like object moving NE, as bright as Venus on a clear night. The white light was solid, and moving in a straight path, with no sound. The object was recorded on my cell phone. However, I made the mistake of trying to focus on it and follow it, instead of standing still. The video is blurred after a few seconds. There are three versions to compare. The original, one with edge detection, and one with a sepia filter. There are two nearby airports and I see planes every day. However, this was no plane.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Friendswood
There were no other sightings in Friendswood on or around September 12th 2013
